name: Treasure Guild
description:
A mini role playing game where loot is key to your success. The more loot you acquire the more powerful your character becomes. Defeat isn't the end, but an opportunity to defeat difficult bosses.

How to Play?

Move your character using the arrow keys on your keyboard or [W, A, S, D].

Use [1,2,3,4,5] to use your abilities.

Credits:

Developer / Designer : AJ Rahim

Music : Random Mind (https://www.patreon.com/randommind)
